resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103180</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103180</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101520</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Big Thaw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Grosse Tauwetter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Grand Dégel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Thaw Grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Disgelo Grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεγάλο thaw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Deshielo Grande</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A thick chunk of Arctic sea ice the size of two states has disappeared. Is it global warming or normal causes? For more information visit: http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/earth/earth20071001/</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein starker Klumpen des arktischen Seeeises die 
Größe von zwei Zuständen ist verschwunden. Ist es globale 
Wärmen oder Normalursachen? Für mehr Informationen Besuch: 
http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/earth/earth20071001/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un gros morceau épais de glace arctique de mer la
taille de deux états a disparu. Est-ce des causes globales de 
chauffage ou de normale ? Pour plus de visite de l'information :
http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/earth/earth20071001/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um pedaço grosso do gelo ártico do mar o tamanho
de dois estados desapareceu. É causas globais aquecer-se ou de 
normal? Para mais visita da informação: 
http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/earth/earth20071001/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un pezzo spesso del ghiaccio che artico del mare 
il formato di due dichiara è sparito. È cause globali 
di normale o di riscaldamento? Per più chiamata delle 
informazioni: 
http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/earth/earth20071001/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα παχύ χοντρό κομμάτι του αρκτικού πάγου θάλασσας
το μέγεθος δύο κρατών έχει εξαφανιστεί. Είναι παγκόσμια 
αύξηση της θερμοκρασίας λόγω του φαινομένου του θερμοκηπίου ή 
κανονικές αιτίες; Για περισσότερη επίσκεψη πληροφοριών: 
http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/earth/earth20071001/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un pedazo grueso del hielo ártico del mar la 
talla de dos estados ha desaparecido. ¿Es el calentarse global o
causas normales? Para más visita de la información: 
http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/videos/earth/earth20071001/</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:NASA
FN:NASA
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101520</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103180</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/the-big-thaw</uri>
